message.content:
I need to identify the line item that represents the systematic allocation of the depreciable amount of an asset over its useful life, which is depreciation.

Looking at the income statement provided, I can see a line item explicitly labeled "Depreciation" with an amount of 91492.31 on 2024-02-05.

This is exactly what I'm looking for - depreciation is the systematic allocation of the cost of a tangible asset over its useful life.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '91492.31'} }
```
